content.prompt: The painting can best be used to demonstrate which of the following about the Qing rulers?

choices.label: Their rejection of their native Manchurian religious traditions
Their attempts to create a new syncretic religion for their empire
Their use of religion to strengthen political control over their empire
Their use of art to make Manchu rule more acceptable to practitioners of Daoism

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
